### Checklist
- [ ] I have checked existing issues and pull requests.
- [ ] I have restarted my IDE and reinstalled the dependencies, but the issue persists.
- [ ] I confirm that there is no issue with my workspace settings, nor with the installed version of Zod or zod-ir.

### Describe the bug
A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

### Expected behavior
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

### Reproduction
The link to a repository or an online code editor/playground (e.g., [Zod Playground](https://zod-playground.vercel.app)) that can reproduce your issue.

### Screenshots
If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.

### The environment
- **Operating System:** (e.g. Windows 11)
- **Node version:** (e.g. v25.2.1)
- **Zod version:** (e.g. v4.3.2)
- **zod-ir version:** (e.g. v1.6.0)

### Additional context
Add any other context about the problem here.
